name: Assignment 2: Walking Sim (myleshouse)
description:
'Cat-astrophe'

Created by Hasan, Michelle, Aaron and Myles

You, Pumpkin, are lost in a dark and desolate forest.

As you remain in this hostile place the sharp claws of hunger rip at you with increasing ferocity,

If you grow too hungry, you will starve, to survive you must heed your hunger levels.

Catching mice, bugs and birds will give you the power to keep going… 

Wherever you may be headed.

Enemies lurk in the shadows, beware!

Encounters with enemies are draining and you will grow hungry at an alarming rate.

In ‘Cat-astrophe’ you play as a lost cat named Pumpkin. He is lost in woods full of ferocious beasts that seek to destroy and devour. As goes the cycle of life, Pumpkin must avoid being eaten, but must also obtain sustenance for himself. As he wanders the forest Pumpkin slowly grows more and more hungry, and if his hunger bar runs out, it means starvation and death. 

This situation is not without hope, Pumpkin may be lost, hungry and alone; but he has a mission. This resilient feline is desperately seeking something that may save him.... And you must aid him in this endeavor!
